id: bigtech:a powerful tool of resistance is already in your hands:2026-02-14T15:00:00.000Z
title: A powerful tool of resistance is already in your hands
author: Lauren Feiner
summary_long: In an eyewitness video analyzed frame by frame by The New York Times, Alex Pretti raises one hand and holds a phone in the other. Federal agents tackle him, and one appears to find and remove a gun holstered on his hip. Then, an agent shoots - and a second follows. They appear to fire nine more shots as Pretti lies on the ground. Source: www.theverge.com. Date: 2026-02-14. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. id: space:replacement crew docks at space station boosts crew back to :2026-02-15T05:16:55.000Z
title: Replacement crew docks at space station, boosts crew back to seven
author: William Harwood
summary_long: A SpaceX Crew Dragon capsule glided in for a Valentine’s Day docking at the International Space Station Saturday boosting the lab’s crew back to a full complement of seven one month after four other fliers came home early because of a medical issue. The Crew Dragon docked at the space-facing port of the lab’s forward Harmony module at 3:15 p.m. EST, 34 hours after launch Friday from the Kennedy Space Center atop a Falcon 9 rocket. “Grateful to be on board, and we’re ready to get to work,” radioed Crew 12 commander Jessica Meir, making her second long-duration stay aboard the space station. Source: spaceflightnow.com. Date: 2026-02-15. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.

id: bigtech:a valentines day homage to crouching tiger hidden dragon:2026-02-14T18:33:36.000Z
title: A Valentine's Day homage to Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
author: Jennifer Ouellette
summary_long: It's Valentine's Day, and while there are plenty of classic and current rom-coms out there for those wishing to immerse themselves in warm and fuzzy feelings, we're opting to celebrate in a different way: honoring Ang Lee's 2000 masterpiece Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, a wuxia tragic fairy tale featuring one of the most beautifully heartbreaking love stories in film at its center. It's also got stunning cinematography and tons of awe-inspiring martial arts sequences, which makes it my personal perfect date night movie. (Spoilers below, but we will give you a heads up before the major reveals.) The film is adapted from a 1940s novel by Wang Dulu and is set sometime during the Qing dynasty, which lasted from 1644 through 1912. (No specific date is given.) The title is a direct translation of a line from a 6th century Chinese poem: "behind the rock in the dark probably hides a tiger, and the coiling giant root resembles a crouching…

id: consumer:watch the nasa spacex crew12 mission dock with the iss:2026-02-14T18:00:00.000Z
title: Watch the NASA SpaceX Crew-12 mission dock with the ISS
author: Mariella Moon
summary_long: The Crew-12 mission, SpaceX’s 20th human spaceflight, launched at 5:15 AM Eastern on February 13 from Cape Canaveral in Florida. It’s expected to dock with the International Space Station today, February 14, at 3:15 PM, and you can watch the event below as it happens. By the time the mission’s Dragon capsule docks with the ISS, it will have traveled approximately 34 hours since lift off. Inside are NASA astronauts Jessica Meir and Jack Hathaway, European Space Agency’s Sophie Adenot and Roscosmos cosmonaut Andrey Fedyaev. Source: www.engadget.com. Date: 2026-02-14. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.

id: consumer:disney accuses bytedance of virtual smashandgrab when using :2026-02-14T19:11:16.000Z
title: Disney accuses ByteDance of 'virtual smash-and-grab' when using copyrighted works to train its AI
author: Jackson Chen
summary_long: Disney is going after another generative AI tool, accusing ByteDance and its recently released Seedance 2.0 of using its copyrighted material without permission. As first reported on by Axios, the Walt Disney Company sent a cease-and-desist letter to ByteDance, claiming the Chinese company developed its Seedance tool "with a pirated library of Disney's copyrighted characters from Star Wars, Marvel, and other Disney franchises, as if Disney's coveted intellectual property were free public domain clip art." The letter, which was obtained by Axios, included examples of Seedance videos featuring copyrighted Disney characters, including Spider-Man, Darth Vader, Peter Griffin and more. Even though ByteDance just released Seedance 2.0 on Thursday, it's already earned praise, but also indignation from Hollywood studios, when it comes to its AI-generating capabilities. With the strong early momentum, Seedance has already found itself in hot water with one of the largest media companies in the world. Source: www.engadget.com. Date: 2026-02-14.

id: space:very lucky day nasa spacex ace astronaut launch to the space:2026-02-14T12:53:20.000Z
title: ‘Very lucky day’: NASA, SpaceX ace astronaut launch to the space station on Friday the 13th
author: Will Robinson-Smith
summary_long: Flying in the face of superstition, NASA and SpaceX conducted a smooth countdown and launch of three astronauts and a cosmonaut to begin the latest, long-duration mission to the International Space Station on Friday, Feb. 13. The nine Merlin 1D engines roared to life at 5:15 a.m. EST (1015 UTC) following a smooth countdown. Source: spaceflightnow.com. Date: 2026-02-14.
